data.text: @Jill4life3 @Josie19752 Yeah, but Spada will always be known for joining Hart. He hasn't spoken out against anything related to Hart and their continual attempts to undermine the vaccine rollout so he's just as guilty as them all.
@Aw_what @Josie19752 Ah, principles. When it comes down to principles vs job the grifters will take the job as they're devoid of anything else.
@Jill4life3 @Josie19752 I think Spada tried to distance himself from Hart due to possible unwanted feedback received by his employer.
@Jill4life3 @Josie19752 Spada was a member of Hart. Although, he was removed from their website's member list quite recently.

@Josie19752 'Might' 🤔 is that a scientific term now? Who's Prof Spada? Sounds legit, not. What a shame they can't channel their energy into proper qualitative and quantitative studies. Sure that would prove exactly what their saying, which is horses*it.

@Josie19752 Isn't it time these idiots got updated directions from their pals at Q anon and the like..

Definitely tedious 🤦‍♂️

@Josie19752 It doesn't cross their minds that the war is more in everyone's mind than these fanatics' sick ideologies? The same as getting ill or dying of covid wasn't/isn't important to them. How can this propaganda continue in these extraordinary sad times? How did UK fall into their hands

@Josie19752 They continue to blame lockdowns for problems children suffer with? Without mentioning the war they witness on tv- the threats of nuclear war - they used to see in movies?This is the constant proof of the state of UK, the deplorable fall of Uk into the hands of heartless fanatics

@Josie19752 This lot have nothing to offer except going on about lockdown. If moaning about ‘restrictions’ has been your thing, especially on here, it’s over unless you rehash ‘lockdown’ over and over.
